# Workspace Instructions

## GitHub Repository

This project's GitHub repository is:

- **Owner:** `svarun115`
- **Repo:** `journal-db-mcp-server`
- **Full path:** `svarun115/journal-db-mcp-server`
- **URL:** https://github.com/svarun115/journal-db-mcp-server

When checking for issues, PRs, or any GitHub operations, always use this repository.

## Project Overview

This is the **Personal Journal Database MCP Server** - a Model Context Protocol server that provides tools for managing a personal journal database including:

- Events (meals, workouts, sleep, work, reflections, entertainment, commutes)
- People and relationships
- Locations (with Google Places integration)
- Health tracking (conditions, medications, supplements)
- Workouts and exercises
- Travel and commutes

## Environment Configuration

| File | Purpose |
|------|---------|
| `.env.development` | Local development database settings |
| `.env.test` | Test database settings (used by pytest) |
| `.env.production` | Production database settings (Azure) |
| `.env.example` | Template with all available settings |
